metadata.Title: CVE-2021-4128 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
When transitioning in and out of fullscreen mode, a graphics object was notcorrectly protected; resulting in memory corruption and a potentiallyexploitable crash.
*This bug only affects Firefox on MacOS. Otheroperating systems are unaffected.*. This vulnerability affects Firefox <95.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
